heading: HB04064
0: AN ACT SEPARATING THE EDUCATION AND TRAINING CENTER SCHOOL I EXTENSION, IN BARANGAY 16, CITY OF BACOLOD, PROVINCE OF NEGROS OCCIDENTAL FROM THE EDUCATION AND TRAINING CENTER SCHOOLS AND CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT ELEMENTARY SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS BACOLOD CITY ELEMENTARY SCHOOL, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
